title: ADi ashaindu varuginrAn ayyan
sahitya:
ADi ashaindu varuginrAn ayyan azhagu nIla iLa mayiliniragenna aLavu mIrum mukham anda 
naghaiyenna kuzhalin ishaiyODu konjum azhagenna gOvindan madamuru kaLiru naDaiyenna


anupallavi

  nIDi ninru vizhi shuzhala shuzhala nOrAnavar manam shuzhala shuzhala 
nimilamAna kamala malariNaigaL vegu nigama vEda muraiyiDavum mozhi munna


caraNam    kanrum Avinamum kAdalODum uravADa gati nIyenru vanda kanniyargaL murai pADa 
tonrUr sAttirangaL tolaiyODum vazhi tEDa tumburuvum nAradarum tUyadAna padam pADa 
tuLLu mada mAnilangaLODu kulavi puLLi mAnarugi taTa naTanam ADa 
tuvaLu shenkazhani taNDODu malariDai ulavu vaNDu maduvUri viLi pADa 
kaLLam ariyAda mayilODu kuyilinam kalandu iDamari gAndhAram pADa 
kaNDu koNDa paccip-pashum kiLigaL kaTrEn niramenrum muTrum parandODa
